name: Angel Green (demo v.1)
description:
This is the first game I've ever made, first humble beginnings. 

Angel Green, divine butterfly collector, wielding pixelated bastard sword fights his way to redemption!  The simplest platformer you've ever played (likely with glitches, makes it harder to speed run?),  I beat it in 4 minutes, see if you can beat my time!  ◖(◣☩◢)◗

tag me if you do! @_onokio_
